motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda including: • Approval of August 28, 2023, City Council Meeting Minutes • Approval of Contract for Street Sweeping Services to Sweeping Corporation of America • Funding Authorization for The Wildcat Learning Center at Dunwoody Park Site Development Plans Change Order • Amendment to Cityworks Software Licensing and Maintenance Agreement

publicHearings.title: FIRST READ: Text Amendment to Regulate Drive-Through Facilities
publicHearings.description: First read of text amendment to regulate drive-through facilities. No public comments for or against.

publicHearings.title: FIRST READ: Text Amendment to Update List of Exempted Activities in Stream Buffers
publicHearings.description: First read of text amendment to update the list of exempted activities in stream buffers. No public comments for or against.
